Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: It works for me. ~callahan what tornado version do you use? I've faced some issues with jupiter and tornado 6 before (and this error looks like yours: https://github.com/jupyter/notebook/issues/4439) but there were no issues after I downgraded tornado to version 5.

Action.author: esplinr
Action.body: We can't replicate this, so we are going to close it. If someone is able to provide enough information to reproduce this problem or provide a pull request for a fix, then they should create a new issue and link to this one.
